title: Certifications
description: RM Spices is committed to delivering the highest quality spices. Our certifications reflect our dedication to food safety, quality, and ethical practices. We adhere to stringent standards to ensure our products meet global requirements and customer expectations.

items.name: ISO 22000:2018
items.description: Food Safety Management System - International standard for food safety management systems ensuring safe food supply chains from farm to table

items.name: HACCP
items.description: Hazard Analysis Critical Control Points - Systematic approach to food safety from biological, chemical, and physical hazards in production processes

items.name: FSSAI
items.description: Food Safety and Standards Authority of India - Licensed food business operator ensuring compliance with Indian food safety standards and regulations

items.name: Organic India
items.description: NPOP Organic Certification - Certified organic spice production meeting National Programme for Organic Production standards

items.name: USDA Organic
items.description: United States Department of Agriculture - USDA certified organic products meeting United States organic standards for international markets

items.name: Spice Board of India
items.description: Spice Board of India Certification - Certified spice production meeting Spice Board of India standards

items.name: APEDA
items.description: APEDA Certification - Certified spice production meeting APEDA standards

qualityAssurance.title: Quality Assurance
qualityAssurance.description: Our quality assurance process begins with sourcing from trusted farmers and continues through rigorous testing and inspection at every stage of production. We employ advanced techniques to ensure purity, freshness, and adherence to our strict quality standards.

items.title: Sourcing
items.description: We source our spices from trusted farmers who follow sustainable and ethical practices.

items.title: Testing
items.description: Our spices undergo rigorous testing for purity, quality, and safety at every stage of production.

items.title: Quality Control
items.description: We adhere to strict quality control measures to ensure our products meet the highest standards.
